participant_1.background:

i really enjoy making friends.

content.text: It's going well! I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're making positive changes in your life.
Thanks! I'm also trying to get in shape so I've been riding my bike to work.
That's awesome! I work as a personal trainer so I know how important it is to stay in shape.
Thanks! I've had to give up some of my favorite foods to get healthy, but it's worth it.
Yeah, it's definitely worth it in the long run.
I know my father would really hate that I'm doing this, but I don't care what he thinks.
Well, it sounds like you're making great progress and I'm proud of you!
Well, my favorite band is WORN and I love going to concerts.
Oh, that's awesome! I've never heard of them before, but I'll check them out.
You should! They're a really good band.
I'm glad to hear you're finding ways to focus on your passions. It sounds like you're on the right track!
Thanks! I'm really trying to be
